methods.Synopsis: Gets the activity events for a user, a user's friends, or everyone on Rdio.

parameters.Name: method
parameters.Description: Method name.

parameters.Name: user
parameters.Description: The user to retrieve an activity stream for.

parameters.Name: scope
parameters.Description: The scope of the activity stream, either “user”, “friends” or “everyone”.

methods.Synopsis: Find the msot popular content for a user, their friends or the whole site.

parameters.Name: method
parameters.Description: Method name.

parameters.Name: user
parameters.Description: The user, or everyone if this is missing.

parameters.Name: type
parameters.Description: Type of content to return.

parameters.Name: friends
parameters.Description: The user's friend's heavy rotation instead of the user's. true/false

parameters.Name: limit
parameters.Description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.Name: start
parameters.Description: The offset of the first result to return.

parameters.Name: count
parameters.Description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.Name: extras
parameters.Description: A list of additional fields to return - a list, comma separated.

parameters.Description: Method name.

parameters.Name: time
parameters.Description: Timeframe. Examples: thisweek, overview, lastweek, twoweeks.

parameters.Description: The offset of the first result to return.

parameters.Name: count
parameters.Description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.Name: extras
parameters.Description: A list of additional fields to return - a list, comma separated.
